definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: A palladium phthalocyanine-PVC membrane electrode for thiocyanate ion was prepared.
sentences.chinese: 研制了酞菁钯PVC膜硫氰酸根离子选择性电极。

sentences.english: Basic cleaning methods of NaSCN solution for PAN fiber have been discussed.
sentences.chinese: 对硫氰酸钠除杂的基本方法进行了简要回顾。

sentences.english: The production expansion of evaporating equipment was introduced for solvent NaSCN in PAN fiber production.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了腈纶生产中溶剂硫氰酸钠蒸发装置的扩产改造。

sentences.english: Mainly contain isothiocyanate as the alive compositions.
sentences.chinese: 主要含有异硫氰酸盐等活性成分。

sentences.english: Reaction of the isocyanic acid (HNCO) and isothiocyanic acid (HNCS) with ethylene radical;
sentences.chinese: 异氰酸及异硫氰酸与氯代乙烯自由基间的反应。

sentences.english: Broccoli and broccoli sprouts have the highest amount of the isothiocyanates.
sentences.chinese: 西兰花和西兰花芽中异硫氰酸盐的含量是最高的。

sentences.english: In this method, the row material is manganous sulfate, which is preparing from leaching solution of pyrolusite.
sentences.chinese: 对硫氰酸钠除杂的基本方法进行了简要回顾。

sentences.english: Thiocyanate is naturally present in body fluids like blood and saliva.
sentences.chinese: 硫氰酸一般存在于体液中，如血液和唾液。

definition: benzaldehyde C6H5CHO, the simplest aromatic aldehyde
histamine (a biogenic amine involved in local immune responses)
thyroid hormone/thyroxine (used to treat underactive thyroid)
